#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        string str;
        cin>>str;
        int temp=(int)(str.at(0)-'0');
        if(temp & 1)
            cout<<"ODD"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"EVEN"<<endl;
    }
}
